content.text: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer with a BASc in Mechanical Engineering and a Commercial Pilot License.

about_bio.text: With strong problem solving skills developed from five years of operations experience in the aviation industry, I'm a team player who is also comfortable working independently. I speak Mandarin and English fluently, and currently learning to speak Japanese!

project_preview_description.text: StartDuck is a productivity app that generates activities based on user's choice of category and input hours.
The same great app, now built with different stacks!
A project that helps schedule mock interviews at LHL

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
